options.text: is much larger during the diastole than during the systole
is much larger during the systole than during the diastole, this tissue is supplied by the blood within the heart chambers
is much larger during the systole than during the diastole
blood flow is equal in the subendocardium during the cardiac cycle

the total length of the distal convoluted tubule

questions.text: If the plasma concentration of X is 2 mg/100ml, the urine concentration of X is 12 mg/ml, the urine flow rate is 1 ml/min, and the glomerular filtration rate is 125 ml/min, then substance X crosses the glomerular membrane.

metadata.matchReason: Topic 55: Clearance = (12 mg/ml Ã— 1 ml/min) / (0.02 mg/ml) = 600 ml/min, which equals RPF - indicates PAH with tubular secretion

Which filtration layer has the lowest permeability in the glomerulus?

options.text: external cells of the Bowman capsule

questions.text: What percentage of plasma glucose entering the glomerular capillary is filtered in the glomeruli?

metadata.matchReason: Topic 52: Filtration fraction is ~20%, so 20% of plasma glucose is filtered (glucose is freely filtered but only 20% of plasma passes through)
